fileheader.author: Richard Harrison
fileheader.description:
Models an F14A with GE engines. The aerodata used is from ref[1] volumes 1 and 2 is only for sweep of 22degrees, positive alpha, clean, low speed so various data have been extrapolated estimated based on best available data where I cannot find specific details for F14 other aero models that I can find (often using NASA CR-1756 as guidance for general trends) are guidance or starting point for each value. The estimation of negative alpha values follows CR-1756 trends with values based on F14 data for positive values.
Engine Thrust are based on NASA-TM-104326 tables 4-6 adjusted for altitude and with augmentation figures based on that of the mil thrust.
The flaps and auxiliary flaps coefficients are modelled based on tuning to meet F-14AAD-1 as no data is currently available. The proportions assigned are relative to their surface area (as measured roughly 64% main, 36% aux) - the values assigned are 0.7 and 0.3 based on this and this applies to ClDFM, CdDFM and CMDFM
fileheader.note: Aircraft origin for measurements is the nose.
Low speed clean should be exactly as an F-14 as this model is based on accurate aerodata (see limitations below).
fileheader.limitation: Spoilers, sweep, speedbrake, flaps, gear aerodata not modelled in ADA101648 - figured out values are be used

reference.author: Donald E. Johnston, David G. Mitchell, Thomas T. Myers
reference.title: Investigation of High-Angle-of-Attack Maneuver-limiting factors, Part I: Anaylsis and simulation

reference.author: Donald E. Johnston, David G. Mitchell, Thomas T. Myers
reference.title: Investigation of High-Angle-of-Attack Maneuver-limiting factors, Part III: Appendices aerodynamic models

reference.author: Sue B. Grafton and Ernie L. Anglin
reference.title: DYNAMIC STABILITY DERIVATIVES AT ANGLES OF ATTACK FROM -5deg TO 90deg FOR A VARIABLE-SWEEP FIGHTER CONFIGURATION WITH TWIN VERTICAL TAILS

reference.author: Gary E. Erickson and Lawrence W. Rogers
reference.title: Effects of Forebody Strakes an Mach number on overall aerodynamic characterisitcs of configuration with 55degree cropped delta wing

reference.author: M. Leroy Spearman
reference.title: Effects of Wing and tail location on the aerodynamic characteristics of an airplane for mach numbers from 0.25 to 4.63
Flight and Static Exhaust Flow Properties of an F110-GE-129 Engine in an F-16XL Airplane During Acoustic Tests
reference.author: Jon K. Holzman, Lannie D. Webb, and Frank W. Burcham, JR.

reference.title: Flutter clearance to the F-14A Variable-Sweep Transition Flight Expirement Airplane - Phase 2
reference.author: Lawrence C. Freudinger and Michael W. Kehoe
Colin K. Drummond and Peter J. Ouzts
reference.title: Real-Time Simulation of an F 110/STOVL Turbofan Engine
Investigation of Transonic Drag Computations in Aerodynamic Preliminary Analysis System (APAS)
reference.author: Jeff Miller

switch.name: fcs/wing-sweep-dmd-flap-limit
switch.test: fcs/aux-flap-pos-deg ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd ge 0.3088235294117647 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd lt 0.3235294117647059
fcs/aux-flap-pos-deg ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd ge 0.3235294117647059 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd lt 0.3382352941176471

switch.name: position/aircraft-on-ground
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/WOW ne 0 gear/unit[1]/WOW ne 0 gear/unit[2]/WOW ne 0

switch.name: fcs/spoiler-differential-cmd
switch.description: Differential spoiler due to stick deflection

switch.name: fcs/spoiler-ground-brake-deployed
switch.test: systems/hydraulics/combined-system-pressure ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-pos-deg lt 55.0 fcs/spoiler-ground-brake-armed ne 0.0 fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[0] le 0.15 fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[1] le 0.15 position/aircraft-on-ground ne 0

switch.name: systems/NWS/engaged
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/wheel-speed-fps le 135 systems/hydraulics/combined-system-pressure ne 0 position/aircraft-on-ground ne 0 systems/holdback/launchbar-engaged eq 0

switch.name: fcs/yaw-damper-active
switch.test: aero/alpha-rad ge -0.175438596491228 aero/alpha-rad le 0.175438596491228 fcs/yaw-damper-enable ne 0.0

switch.name: fcs/roll-sas-active
switch.test: aero/alpha-rad ge -0.175438596491228 aero/alpha-rad le 0.2631578947368421 fcs/roll-sas-enable ne 0.0

switch.name: fcs/pitch-damper-active
switch.test: aero/alpha-rad ge -0.175438596491228 aero/alpha-rad le 0.2631578947368421 fcs/elevator-cmd-norm ge -0.15 fcs/elevator-cmd-norm le 0.15 fcs/pitch-damper-enable ne 0.0

fcs_function.name: aero/alpha-indicated-deg
fcs_function.description: ARI nose probe; ref ADA101648 p84; alpha_true = .8122 alphaNOSEPROBE + .797deg

function.description: Centre of pressure due to mach and wingsweep angle
High speeds CADC control effectivity limitation of rudder and stabilator

pure_gain.name: cg-x-chord-percent
pure_gain.description: Percent offset of the CoP from the CG

function.name: aero/coefficients/Cmach
function.description: Mach factor (all except drag) (NASA-TM-84643 Figure 3 Clalpha) and values for AOA derived from NASA-aaia-2000-0900 Figure 4

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdTNK
function.description: Incremental Cd due to external tanks

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClSweepFactor
function.description: Wing sweep factor from norm of 22 (NASA-TM-D-6909)

function.name: aero/coefficients/DClSLM
function.description: Delta Cl due to mean slat position

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDFM
function.description: Delta Cl due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDAFM
function.description: Delta Cl due to mean aux flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDSpL
function.description: Delta Cl due to left spoiler deflection - Figure 8, NASA-TB D-8236

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDSpR
function.description: Delta Cl due to right spoiler deflection - Figure 8, NASA-TB D-8236

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDSp
function.description: CD increment due to spoiler deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdMach
function.description: Drag increment due to mach (NASA-TP-2580 Figure 16)

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDSLM
function.description: Delta Cd due to mean slat position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDFM
function.description: Delta Cd due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDAFM
function.description: Delta Cd due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CLDSp
function.description: Delta CL due differential spoiler deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/CLDSpR
function.description: Delta CL due differential right spoiler deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/CLDSpL
function.description: Delta CL due differential left spoiler deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/DCMAIM
function.description: Pitch moment increment due to aim missiles

function.name: aero/coefficients/CMDSp
function.description: CM increment due to spoiler deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/CMDFM
function.description: CM increment due to flap mean position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CMDAFM
function.description: CM increment due to flap mean position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CNDSP
function.description: Yaw momement increment due to spoiler deflection
